channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly tipping, 6th November
item.description:
Yet more rubbish dumped in the usual place.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Pates Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 5th November
item.description:
Fly tipping again... this is a continuous problem in this area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gloucester Road, Norton, Tewkesbury

item.title: Overgrown hedge blocking footpath, 5th November
item.description:
The hedge is very overgrown and unable to walk on the footpath with a pushchair
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Greyhound Gardens, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken paving slabs and sunken, 5th November
item.description:
34 orchard avenue are having building work done and the wagons have been pulling on drive breaking up the paving slabs and making them very uneven broke and sunk. The mud is being tracked when I walk my dog as it’s extremely messy

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Orchard Avenue, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: White lines and directional information faded, 5th November
item.description:
Lane markings around the whole roundabout have faded, resulting in vehicles going in the wrong lanes for their intended turn. Risking other vehicles safety
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court Roundabout, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car, 5th November
item.description:
This car has been parked on the junction and on the pavement for 3 weeks now and it is time something was done about it!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Lambert Avenue, Shurdington, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: All the way across the road has been dug up and not filled properly, yet again! It’s like you use plasticine to fill roads now., 5th November
item.description:
Approx 2 meters from the roundabout, can’t miss it all the way across the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 5th November
item.description:
GIVE AND TAKE 28 DAY PLUS TEMPORARY FOOTWAY CLOSURE PLEASE CUT OFF DAMAGED CONCRETE BOLLARD 300x300x22mm AND FILL WITH TARMAC PATCH TO MAKE SAFE AS BARRIERS KEEP GETTING KNOCKED DOWN STATS REQUIRED (Damaged Bollard)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked with leaves, 5th November
item.description:
Drain outside Chinese takeaway is blocked. Due to other drains not working in this street this is adding to the road flooding issues and potentate properties flooding.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44A, Church Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Urgent - potential flood risk. Drain not present but on highways map, 5th November
item.description:
Drain is shown on highways map outside 56 Church Street but is not present. Must have been tarmaced over the same as other drains on church street. Properties are at risk of flooding as the road frequently floods. Drain needs to be reinstated as a matter of urgency. Current volume of traffic due to A40 closure is making the situation worse. Urgent inspection and reinstatement is required.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Church Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Glass, bobbles, fag ends, 5th November
item.description:
Winchcombe Street is filthy, there's tons of fag ends, glass and general rubbish everywhere
Report on FixMyStreet
